description: Welcome to your own section of BuildTheEarth. Here you can see your own progress, joined Build Teams and other usefull information.

teams.title: Присоединился к
teams.description: Build teams are the easiest way to join Build The Earth. These groups work together on a multiplayer server to build cities, regions and sometimes even entire countries.

empty.description: Вы еще не вступили ни в одну команду

owned.title: Управляю командами
owned.description: The Build Teams listed below are all owned by you or you have management permission on them.

claims.title: Полигоны
claims.description: Claims are Buildings or Areas you are working on or have finished. They help us keep track of what is already build.

create.description: Create Claims to track Building Progress

modal.title: Создать полигон
modal.description: Create a new Claim to track your progress.

security.title: Безопасность
security.description: To reset your current password, please log out and back in and choose `Forgot Password`, an email with instructions will be sent to you. If you encounter any problems, message us.
